text: A roof is the cover at the top of a building. Roof may also refer to: ==People== * Dylann Roof (born 1994), American perpetrator of a 2015 mass shooting * Gene Roof (born 1958), American baseball outfielder and manager * Kemar Roofe (born 1993), English footballer * Phil Roof (born 1941), American baseball catcher, coach, and manager * Ted Roof (born 1963), American football player and coach ==Other uses== * Roof (rock formation), a rock overhang that reach, or nearly reach, the horizontal * Roof (Chinese constellation), one of the 28 mansions of the Chinese constellations * Roof (category theory), a generalization of the notion of relation between two objects of a category * Automobile roof, the top covering of a vehicle ==See also== * The Roof (disambiguation) * Rooftop (disambiguation)
title: Roof (disambiguation)
